item.title: Epic Seven Hell Raid: Yufine's Counter Cheese Strategy for an Efficient Clear
item.description: Introduction In a recent update, Epic Seven revamped their raid system, making it more challenging and time-consuming. One major change is that now, if you leave the raid, all the mobs reset, and you have to fight them again upon re-entry. This means that clearing the raid requires multiple entries and can be quite tedious. However, there is a strategy that allows you to clear the entire Hell Raid in just one entry.

Introduction Shadow Sea Land, or SL, is a challenging game mode in Idle Heroes where players progress through various levels by defeating waves of enemies.

item.title: The Complete Guide to Ghazghkull - The New Orc Guild Raid Boss: Gameplay, Traits, and Best Characters to Use
item.description: Guild raids in King’s Raid are always a source of excitement for players, and the addition of the new orc leader Ghazghkull has taken it to a whole new level. Known as one of the most influential orcs in the Warhammer 40,000 Universe, Ghazghkull is a formidable boss that has fought against various factions including the Imperium, Eldari, Chaos, and Necrons. In this guide, we will take an in-depth look at Ghazghkull, his skills, traits, and discuss which characters are good or bad against him.
